title: Pro Camera 7 for iPhone/iPad/iPod touch v 5.3 ipa
description:
This is a cracked version of Pro Camera 7 ( it will only work on jailbroken iPhones/iPads or iPod touch. If you have any question about jailbreaking than feel free to ask. If you don't know how to sync cracked apps to your jailbroken device don't worry because there will be instructions in the folder. Thanks


Description

***** Price drop for a limited time! *****
Welcome to the new dimension of mobile photography. Welcome to ProCamera 7 for iOS 7. ProCamera is a photo, video, and editing app bursting with state-of-the-art technology that helps you SHOOT LIKE A PRO.

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Highly flexible and impressively powerful, Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ easily earning its rank as one of the finest photography apps out there at the moment.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 148Apps

Ã¢â‚¬Å“ProCamera 7 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ The iPhone Camera App Every Passionate Mobile Photographer Must HaveÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Ã¢â‚¬â€œ MOBLIVIOUS

Ã¢â‚¬Å“ProCamera 7 is for iPhotographers around the world who want the best of the best.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Appolicious

For years, ProCamera has been setting the standard for photo apps. The NY Times says "the high-end crowd swears by it", National Geographic chose it as one of 8 "must-have travel apps". There are also close to 2 million users who have trusted ProCamera for years.

ProCamera 7 is much more than an upgrade. It redefines professional mobile photography through a whole new capture experience. It brings together professional functions with easy and intuitive use. ProCamera 7 takes full advantage of iOS 7. In addition to many new features, the UI is simplified and refined to meet highest standards. Easy - yet multi-functional when needed. It is the essence of ProCamera: five years of feedback from millions of ProCamera users, world-class developers and professional photographers from all over the world.

HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a small selection of ProCamera 7Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s features:

ADVANCED EDITING CONTROL
Editing is taken to a new level: Quickly and seamlessly swipe between filters, use image adjustment tools, or crop and correct photos. 

76 PROFESSIONAL FILTERS AND EFFECTS
Swipe left or right to preview filters on images. Easily compare filters. Filter strength can be controlled with a simple up/down swipe gesture. 

FULL RESOLUTION PHOTO PREVIEW
In Album when you double-tap it. ProCamera is the only app that shows you every pixel of your photos.

INCREASED CAMERA CONTROL 
Separate Focus and Exposure points plus White Balance Lock allow for increased creative control in both photo and video mode.

NIGHT CAMERA
Get professional, sharp and noise free night shots! Shutter speed can be set to 1/8, 1/4, 1/2, and even 1 second (for all except iPhone 5S). 

SQUARE AND WIDESCREEN CAPTURE FORMATS
The new capture formats (16:9, 4:3, 3:2, 1:1, 3:1) use maximum screen estate for accurate composition and framing. 

100% ACCURACY
You always see what you get. ProCamera precisely previews how you photo will look like - with any capture format. 

RAPID FIRE MODE
Captures photos up to 10 shots per second (iPhone 5+).

ANTI SHAKE & SMART TRIGGER
For perfectly sharp photos.

STEADY LIGHT
Long-press on flash icon to de/activate the torch in photo mode. 

Ã¢â‚¬Ëœ3D TILTMETERÃ¢â‚¬â„¢
For perfectly straight photos at any camera orientation/angle.

IMPROVED VIDEO CONTROLS
Include smooth video focus, real time video zoom, and 60 fps (5, 5C) to 120 fps (5S) slow motion capture.

DEDICATED LIGHTBOX
For saving, sharing, exporting or deleting of photos/videos within the app.

SINGLE AND BATCH SHARING 
On Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram (with unique SquarePrepare function for posting photos on Instagram); or batch upload to DropBox. 

NEW FAST ACCESS TO YOUR PHOTOS AND VIDEOS 
by flicking from the left margin to right in the viewfinder.

Extremely FAST STARTUP SPEED, Live Histogram, REALTIME 6x DIGITAL ZOOM, SELF TIMER, distraction free shooting with FULLSCREEN MODE, Illustrated Manual, Code Scanner, New EXIF/VideoMetaData Viewer, Manual Save, and much more.

CONNECT WITH US
Join the ProCamera community! Visit our blog, sign up to the newsletter for the latest tutorials, news and features. Tag your photos with #procamera in Instagram for inclusion to our regular ProCamera showcase.
